googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Tyler Jones
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Done some vinyl work and built a porch onto were i was living before i moved he gave me a time and date and was there on time started the next day after we spoke but done wonderful i would  use him again hands down and highly recommend using him if u need anything done he is very professional and done an excellent job
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Bob's Handyman Service

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: David Johnston
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
We have shutters too high for us to paint comfortably (two sets, only took a photo of one). Folks had referred us all over the place to handy-men or painters that didn't call back, or never showed up.

Found Bob on Google and gave him a call. He called back, we set a time. He arrived on time. The day of the work he showed early and well prepared.

The end result looks great and the two windows now match the rest of the house. We had been trying for months to get this done - and from first call to Bob until job completed was less than a week.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Bob's Handyman Service

aboutUs: Bob's Handyman Service is a trusted local provider of comprehensive handyman solutions in Scottsboro, Alabama, and the surrounding areas. Our team of skilled professionals specializes in a wide range of home repair and maintenance services, from drywall repairs and installations to carpentry, molding, and caulking. We take pride in our expertise and commitment to delivering exceptional results tailored to your unique needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a reliable and knowledgeable handyman service dedicated to your complete satisfaction.
sellingPoints: Meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to quality workmanship on every project.
Prompt and efficient service, ensuring your home maintenance needs are addressed promptly.
Comprehensive solutions tailored to your specific requirements, backed by our team's extensive expertise.
